directions: In a saucepan cover parsnips and fennel with salted water and boil, covered, 15 to 20 minutes, or until very tender. Drain vegetables well in a large sieve. In a food processor purée hot vegetables with butter and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 2 large parsnips (about 1/2 pound), peeled and cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices
1 small fennel bulb (sometimes called anise), stalks trimmed flush with bulb and bulb chopped (about 1 cup)
title: Parsnip Fennel Purée
